name: Aging/Ageless
desc: This item causes its user to age quickly, or slow or cease aging.

name: Brotherhood
desc: This curse links the object with another object with similar characteristics, eventually leading both items and their users to their destruction.

name: Contact
desc: This item causes some powerful entity (most likely the item's creator) to contact its user.

name: Cursed
desc: This item has a curse placed on it that causes its wielder some negative effect. It might also make it difficult for its user to get rid of it.

name: Madness
desc: The user of this item risks going mad.

name: Obsession
desc: The user of this item risks becoming obsessed with it and unwilling to part with it.

name: Possessive
desc: Once this item has an owner, it is very difficult for another to claim it. It may require its owner to relinquish it, or for the new user to kill them.

name: Psychic Bond
desc: The object immediately creates a psychic connection with anyone that uses it at least once. After that, anything bad that happens to the item also befalls the individual, even if there is no direct physical connection between the two.

name: Trap
desc: This item was secretly created to kill, capture, or manipulate its user.
